questions.question: Coal forms over time from the remains of....
Which of the following is not an example of the land degradation associated with fossil fuel production?
The natural resource that is "cleaned" in a refinery is called.....
Electricity is produced by....
Which of these is not considered a source of carbon emission produced by fossil fuels?
What are the three "states of matter?"

choices.answer: Joslyn, Mary, Liliana (they matter... don't they?)

questions.question: Which of the following is the best definition of a natural resource?

choices.answer: a drawing etched on a tree that you read more than once (get it?)
something that we use that comes from nature
Mr. Bertsch (oops...I thought the question said "natural athlete"

questions.question: Which of the following is the best way to conserve a natural resource?

choices.answer: Cut down everything that creates shade.
skip seven lines between answers when you write

questions.question: Which of the following best describes how fossil fuels create energy?

choices.answer: Carrying a bucket of coal up a mountain

questions.question: What is smog?

choices.answer: a mixture of passion fruit, orange and guava juices. (Wait! That's Pog)
a tasteful blend of oil and water
an explosion created when natural gas collides with carbon monoxide

questions.question: Which of the following is not true about carbon?

choices.answer: It is considered to be a cause of air pollution
it is used to create many useful innovations
It is chemical element found on the periodic table.

questions.question: What is acid precipitation?

choices.answer: A part of the water cycle
When the rain burns your face

questions.question: Which of the following does not come from a natural resource?

choices.answer: They all come from natural resources you dummy!

questions.question: Which of the following is not considered a consequence from the burning of fossil fuels?

choices.answer: Higher levels of acidity in the oceans
Improved eyesight due to having to "squint" more.

questions.question: What is "strip" mining?

choices.answer: When a miner begins to take of his/her clothes while working
Mining all the way to the earth's mantle
Searching the ground for coins while walking in Vegas.
Scraping the earth's surface to uncover coal or mineral deposits

questions.question: How is steam used in the process of oil drilling?

choices.answer: It is used to force oil to the surface
It is the power source needed to transport the oil rig
It is used to heat the workers' expresso (just like Starbucks!)
It is used to clean the deck of the rig

questions.question: Which of the following is not true about Solar Energy?

choices.answer: The sun won't rise without its morning cup of coffee
Solar cells convert sunlight into electricity.
It's usage is increasing throughout the world

questions.question: Which of the following is not a nonrenewable resource? (How confusing!)
An "alternative" resource is....

choices.answer: a natural resource that is less expensive than fossil fuels
Tommy (you know...that kid sitting at the end of the bench)
A natural resource that can be used instead of fossil fuels

questions.question: Which of the following is not a fact about trees?

choices.answer: They absorb oxygen and produce carbon dioxide
They can be fun to climb
They are a type of natural resource

questions.question: Hydroelectric energy is produced with the use of what natural resource?

choices.answer: Uh...uh...you know....that stuff that comes out of the faucet

questions.question: What is it called when pollutants are released on land and end up in our water?
Saving aluminum cans so that they can be used again is called....
Which of the following is not true?

choices.answer: Methane gas is usually found with oil deposits.
Electricity can be produced by burning fossil fuels.

questions.question: Which of the following is not true about global warming?

choices.answer: It is the gradual warming of the earth's atmosphere.
It is caused by the use of alternative resources.
It is causing the earth's oceans to heat up
It may be causing polar ice caps to melt

questions.question: The phrase "natural fluctuation of the earth's climate" is...

choices.answer: the belief that the global warming we are experiencing is a natural phase
The weather changes from day to day
Corona virus outbreaks are influenced by the weather
